info.title: Studio API
info.description: API for creating transcription, translation, and dubbing projects with file URLs.

get.description: Retrieve a list of projects for the authenticated account

post.description:
Create a project for transcription, translation, and dubbing. This endpoint supports two modes:

**Mode 1: File Upload** - Provide `fileCount` to upload files directly. The endpoint redirects to an external upload service where files can be uploaded. After upload completion, the upload service will finalize the project automatically.

**Mode 2: File URLs** - Send a multipart/form-data request and provide `fileUrls` (JSON array of publicly accessible file URLs), along with the same configuration fields (`title`, `sourceLanguage`, `subtitleProfiles`, etc.).

Both modes require the same configuration parameters (sourceLanguage, subtitleProfiles, translationLanguages, etc.).

Note: The File URL mode can be unreliable because some remote servers block non-browser requests (e.g., bot protection, required cookies, or user-agent restrictions). Prefer the upload mode when available.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific project
Retrieve available subtitle profiles for the authenticated account

Retrieve overall status, per-language completed steps, or single-language steps using query params. For completed steps, you will find only fields for the completed steps. If transcription is not completed yet you will receive an empty map.

parameters.name: summary
parameters.description: If true, returns overall status as a string.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language code to get steps for a specific language.

get.description: Retrieve transcription, translation or dubbing outputs using a single query-driven endpoint.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Output format. Defaults to vtt for transcription, srt for translation/dubbing.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code (when requesting a specific translation or dubbing).
